Key Match Events: The Celtics went on a 19-4 run to close the second quarter, pushing a seven-point lead to 22.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics hit 18 3-pointers, including 15 in the first half, and outscored the Hawks 54-18 from behind the 3-point line.
Others: Jayson Tatum scored 26 of his 28 points in the first half, and the Boston Celtics routed the Atlanta Hawks 123-93 on Monday night for their third straight win. Hawks guard Trae Young left the game in the third quarter with a right rib strain.
